kw.msg:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
<title>Language Studio Private and Secure Translation</title>
<link rel="shortcut icon" href="images/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="css/lsets.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" src="js/lsemain.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">
var fBrowseFile;
var hTable = new Array();
var mainFiles = [];

$(document).ready(function(){
	loadTemplate();
});
function loadTemplate(){
	
	LoadDataDefault();
	
	$(window).bind('resize', function(e) {
		$("#divCopyright").css("bottom", (-1)*($(window).scrollTop()) + 'px');
	}).trigger('resize');

	fBrowseFile = document.getElementById('fBrowseFile');
	
	var errorLoading = "";
	if(errorLoading.trim().length>0){
		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', true);
		document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').innerHTML = "Error: "+errorLoading;
		document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').style.color = 'red';
	}
}

function validateEmail(email) {
	if(email.trim().length==0) return false;	
    var re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
    return re.test(String(email).toLowerCase());
}

function getOutputFormat(ext){
	var out = "";	
	if($('#chkoutsamedoc').prop('checked')) { 
		out = document.getElementById('sameasdocumentlabel').innerText;
	}
	if($('#chkouthtml').prop('checked') && !(ext=="ppt" ||ext=="pptx")) {
		if(out.length>0) out += ",";	
		out += document.getElementById('htmllabel').innerText;
	}
	if($('#chkouttext').prop('checked')) {
		if(out.length>0) out += ",";	
		out += document.getElementById('textlabel').innerText;
	}
	return out;
}

function getOutputFormatValue(ext){
	var out = "";	
	if($('#chkoutsamedoc').prop('checked')) { 
		out = "chkoutsamedoc";
	}
	if($('#chkouthtml').prop('checked') && !(ext=="ppt" ||ext=="pptx")) {
		if(out.length>0) out += ",";	
		out += "chkouthtml";
	}
	if($('#chkouttext').prop('checked')) {
		if(out.length>0) out += ",";	
		out += "chkouttext";
	}
	return out;
}

function getRadioValue(name, bText) {
	var test = document.getElementsByName(name);
	var out = "";
    for (var i=0; i < test.length; i++) {
		if (test[i].checked==true) {
			out = test[i].value.trim();
			break;
        }
    }
    
    if(bText){
	    //Select text to show
	    if(out=='samedoc'){
	    	out = document.getElementById('sameasdocumentlabel').innerText;
	    }
	    else if(out=='html'){
	    	out = document.getElementById('htmllabel').innerText;
	    }
	    else if(out=='text'){
	    	out = document.getElementById('textlabel').innerText;
	    }
	    else if(out=='downloaddoc'){
	    	out = document.getElementById('downloadlabel').innerText;
	    }
	    else if(out=='email'){
	    	out = document.getElementById('emaildocumentlabel').innerText;
	    	out += ": <span class=\"linkText\">"+GetTextboxValue('txtEmail')+"</span>";
	    }
    }
    
	return out;
}

function TranslateClick(jobmode) {
	
	resetErrorText();
	
	if(document.getElementById('trTranslateText').style.display=="none"){
		//jobmode = "batch";
		
		//check email
		if(getRadioValue('rAfterTran',false)=='email'){
			if(!validateEmail(GetTextboxValue('txtEmail'))){
				alert("Please specify validate email.");
				return;
			}
		}

		//check output
		if(!$('#chkouthtml').prop('checked') &&
			!$('#chkoutsamedoc').prop('checked') && !$('#chkouttext').prop('checked')){
			SetVisible('tblFile', false);
	 		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
	 		setErrorText("Please select at least 1 output format.");
			return;
		}
		
		//check if all ppt/ppx and Output Format=html only, 
		//show error message and not allow to submit.
		var bHTMLOnly = ifHTMLOnly();		
		var bAllPPT = true;
		for (var i in mainFiles) {
			var extension = mainFiles[i].name.split('.').pop();
			if(extension!="ppt" && extension!="pptx"){
				bAllPPT = false;
				break;
			}
		}
		if(bAllPPT && bHTMLOnly){
			SetVisible('tblFile', false);
	 		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
	 		setErrorText("PowerPoint output cannot be HTML file.");
			return;
		}		

		if(hSelectedFileMain.length>0){

			var _lang = getLang();	    	
			var domaincode = GetComboboxValue('selEngine').split(':')[0];
	    	var domaindesc = getDomainDesc(domaincode, _lang);
	    	
    		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);
	    	var tblFileProcess = document.getElementById('tblFileProcess');
	    	var rowID = parseInt(document.getElementById('rowCount').value);

        	var rep = "", text = "", filename = "", size = "", ext = "";
        	var mapFile = {};
			for (var i in hSelectedFileMain)
			{
				//data.indexOf('Error:')
				var info = new String(hSelectedFileMain[i]);
				if (info.indexOf('_aosizeao_')!=-1) {
		    		rowID = (rowID+1);
					text = hSelectedFileMain[i];				
					filename = text.split('_aosizeao_')[0];
					size = text.split('_aosizeao_')[1];

					ext = filename.split('.').pop();					
					if(bHTMLOnly && (ext=="ppt" || ext=="pptx")){
						setErrorText("PowerPoint output cannot be HTML file.");						
					}
					else{						
						var trProp = {};
						trProp["RowID"] = rowID;
						trProp["FileName"] = filename;
						trProp["Size"] = size;
						trProp["Domain"] = domaincode;
						trProp["Output"] = getOutputFormatValue(ext);
						trProp["Status"] = "Queue";
						
						var afterTran = getRadioValue('rAfterTran',false);
						trProp["AfterTran"] = afterTran;
						if(afterTran=='email'){
							trProp["Email"] = GetTextboxValue('txtEmail');
						}else{
							trProp["Email"] = "";
						}										
						hTable.push(rowID, trProp);
						
			        	mapFile[filename] = rowID;					
						if(text.length>0){
				    		rep += "<tr id=\"tr"+(rowID)+"\"><td>" + filename + "</td>";//File Name
				    		rep += "<td align=\"center\">" + size + "</td>";//Size
				     		rep += "<td>"+domaindesc+"</td>"; //Language Pair 	
				     		rep += "<td>"+getOutputFormat(ext)+"</td>"; //Output Format
				     		rep += "<td>"+getRadioValue('rAfterTran',true)+"</td>"; //After Translation
				     		rep += "<td align=\"center\"></td>"; //Status
				    		rep += "<td align=\"center\"><img onclick=\"DiableRow('"+(rowID)+"');\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\" src=\"images/delete.png\"></td></tr>";
						}
					}
				}
			}
			
	    	document.getElementById('rowCount').value = rowID + 1;

	    	tblFileProcess.innerHTML = tblFileProcess.innerHTML.replace("</th></tr>", "</th></tr>"+rep);
	    	setTableFileBlank();
// 	    	tblFile.innerHTML = "<tr><th width=\"75%\"><img src=\"images/spacer.png\" style=\"height:1px;\"></th><th width=\"25%\"><img src=\"images/spacer.png\" style=\"height:1px;\"></th></tr>";
	   	

    		$("#tblFileProcess th:first").html(GetDisplayLang("tblfilename",_lang));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(1)").html(GetDisplayLang("tblsize",_lang));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(2)").html(GetDisplayLang("tbllanguagepair",_lang));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(3)").html(GetDisplayLang("documentoutputformatlabel",_lang));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(4)").html(GetDisplayLang("documentaftertranslationlabel",_lang));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(5)").html(GetDisplayLang("tblstatus",_lang));
    		
	    	SetVisible('tblFileProcess', true);
			SetVisible('tblFile', false);
			SetVisible('selectfile', false);
						
			//call translate		
			TranslateBatch(mapFile);
		}
		$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
	}
	else{
		//jobmode = "realtime";
		TranslateRealTime();
	}

}

function ifHTMLOnly(){
	if($('#chkouthtml').prop('checked') &&
			!$('#chkoutsamedoc').prop('checked') && !$('#chkouttext').prop('checked')){
		return true;
	}
	else{
		return false;
	}
}

function setErrorText(errorText){
	SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', true);
	document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').innerHTML = errorText;
	document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').style.color = 'red';
}

function setErrorRealtime(errorText){

	document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = errorText;			
	document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = 'red';
	
	if (trim(sText).length > 5000) {
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = errorText;			
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = 'red';
	}
	else{
		$('#divTranslateButton').removeClass('disabled');
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = trim(sText).length+"/5000";
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = '#999999';
	}
	
}

function resetErrorText(){
	
	SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);
	
	var sText = GetTextboxValue('txtText');
	document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = trim(sText).length+"/5000";
	document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = '#999999';	
}

function setTableFileBlank(){
	tblFile.innerHTML = "<tr><th width=\"75%\"><img src=\"images/spacer.png\" style=\"height:1px;\"></th><th width=\"25%\"><img src=\"images/spacer.png\" style=\"height:1px;\"></th></tr>";
}

function TranslateRealTime() {
	if (validation()) {
		//clear output
		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').placeholder = "";	
		SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', '');
		
		DiableControls('translate');
		var domaincode = GetComboboxValue('selEngine').split(':')[0];
		$.post('Translate.jsp', { jobmode: '2'
			, domaincode: domaincode
			, datatoprocess: GetTextboxValue('txtText')
		}, function(data){
			data = trim(data);
			if (data.indexOf('Error:') == -1){
				SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', data);
			}
			else{
				document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = data;	
				document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = 'red';
			}
			EnableControls('translate');				
		});
	}		
}

var mapJob = {};
var mapStatus = {};
function TranslateBatch(mapFile) {
		
	DiableControls('translate');
	
	var domaincode = GetComboboxValue('selEngine').split(':')[2];
	
	var savehtml = "false", savetext = "false";
	if($('#chkouthtml').prop('checked')) {
		savehtml = "true";
	}
	if($('#chkouttext').prop('checked')) {
		savetext = "true";
	}

	var form = document.getElementById('theform');
	var oData = new FormData(); //FormData(form);
	oData.append("jobmode", "1");
	oData.append("domaincode", domaincode);	
	
	var bHTMLOnly = ifHTMLOnly();
	var ext = "";
	for (var i in mainFiles) {
		var f = mainFiles[i];
		ext = f.name.split('.').pop();
		if(bHTMLOnly && (ext=="ppt" || ext=="pptx")){
			//skip or do something later
		}
		else{
			//Send to translate
			oData.append("fBrowseFile"+i, mainFiles[i]);			
		}
	}
	
	oData.append("savehtml", savehtml);
	oData.append("savetext", savetext);	
	
    $.ajax({
        url: "Translate.jsp",
        data: oData,
        processData: false,
        contentType: false,
        type: 'POST',
        success: function(data){

        	document.getElementById('fBrowseFile').value = "";
        	hSelectedFileMain = new Array();
        	mainFiles = [];
        	
			data = trim(data);
			if (data.indexOf('Error:') == -1){
				//loop get job status				
				var email = GetTextboxValue('txtEmail');
				var aData = data.trim().split("_LSSPLITLS_");
				var rowid = "", jobID = "", jobIDList = "", status = "", filename = ""; 
			    for (var i in aData) {
			    	if(aData[i].trim().length>0){			    	
				    	var aText = aData[i].split("|");
				    	//jobid|file|status
				    	jobID = aText[0];
				    	filename = aText[1];
				    	status = aText[2];
				    	
				    	rowid = mapFile[filename];
				    	
				    	if(jobIDList.trim().length>0)
					    	jobIDList += "," + jobID;
				    	else
				    		jobIDList = jobID;
				    	
				    	mapJob[jobID] = rowid+"|"+filename+"|"+email;				    	
		        		UpdateFileProcess(rowid, filename, jobID, status);
			    	}
			    }
				
				getJobStatusAndDownload(jobIDList);
				
			} else {				
				var tblFileProcess = document.getElementById('tblFileProcess');	
				tblFileProcess.innerHTML = "<tbody><tr><th width=\"30%\">Document(s) to translate</th><th width=\"7%\">Size</th><th width=\"15%\">Language Pair</th><th width=\"15%\">Output Format</th><th width=\"20%\">After Translation</th><th width=\"10%\">Status</th><th width=\"3%\"><img onclick=\"DiableAllRow();\" alt=\"Clear all completed job.\" style=\"cursor: pointer;\" src=\"images/clear.png\"></th></tr></tbody>";
				SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);
				SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', true);
				document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').innerHTML = data;
				document.getElementById('lblErrorBatch').style.color = 'red';
			}
        }
    });
}

function getstatus(statuscode) {
	var Lang = getLang();  
	return getstatus(statuscode, Lang);
}

function getstatus(statuscode, Lang) {
	
	if(Lang==null){
		Lang = getLang();  
	}
		
	var status = "";
	
	var hLangProp = hLang[Lang];
	if(hLangProp["status"]!=null){
		var hStatus = hLangProp["status"];
		status = hStatus[statuscode];
	}
	else{
		//If no override, load default
		status = hStatusDefault[statuscode];
	}
	
	return status;
}

// Validation Function.
function validation() {
	var domaincode = $('#selEngine option:selected').val();
	var datatoprocess = GetTextboxValue('txtText');
	if (domaincode === '') {
		alert("Please select engine.");
		return false;
	} else if (datatoprocess === '') {
		//alert("Please input text.");
		return false;
	} else if(trim(datatoprocess).length>5000){
		//alert("Please input text.");
		return false;
	} else {
		return true;
	}
	
}

var iSleep = 1000;
var iGetJobStatusTimeout = 300000; //300000=5 minutes
var iTotalTime = 0;
function getJobStatusAndDownload(jobId) {
	if (jobId === '') {
		alert("jobid is required.");
		return;
	}
	
	// call job status
	$.post('JobStatusDownload.jsp', { requesttype: 'job.status'
		, jobidlist: jobId
		, detaillevel: '1'
	}, function(data){
		data = trim(data);
		if (data.indexOf('|') != -1){
			var aText = data.split("|");
			var jobID = "", statusCode = "", jobDetail = "";
		    for (var i in aText) {
		    	if(aText[i].trim().length>0){					
					jobID = aText[i].split("_")[0];
					statusCode = aText[i].split("_")[1];				
				   	jobDetail = mapJob[jobID];
				   						
					rowid = jobDetail.split("|")[0];
					filename = jobDetail.split("|")[1];
					
	        		UpdateFileProcess(rowid, filename, jobID, statusCode);        		
					Download(jobID, data, statusCode);
				}
		    }
		}
		else{
			Download(jobId, data, "");
		}
		
	});
}

function UpdateFileProcess(rowid, filename, jobID, status){
	
	var tblFileProcess = document.getElementById('tblFileProcess');	
	var text = tblFileProcess.innerHTML;	
	var trProp = getTR(rowid);
	trProp["Status"] = status;
	trProp["JobID"] = jobID;
		
	if(status==2){
		status = getstatus(status);
		status = "<a href=\"/resources/download-file/"+jobID+".zip\" title=\"JobID: "+jobID+"\">"+status+"</a>";
	}
	else{
		status = getstatus(status); //mapStatus[status];
		status = "<span title=\"JobID: "+jobID+"\">"+status+"</span>";
	}
		
	var pattern = RegExp('(<tr[ ]id="tr'+rowid+'"><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><td[^>]*>)(.*?)(<\/td><td[^>]*>.*?<\/td><\/tr>)','g');
	text = text.replace(pattern, "$1"+status+"$3");
	tblFileProcess.innerHTML = text;
	
}

function Download(jobId, data, statuscode) {

	if (data.indexOf('Error:') == -1){		
		if (statuscode == "2") {			
			
			var filename = "";
			if(jobId.indexOf(',') == -1){	
				filename = mapJob[jobId].split("|")[1];
	    	}
			var receipientsemail = mapJob[jobId].split("|")[2];
			
			//call job download
			$.post('JobStatusDownload.jsp', { requesttype: 'job.download'
				, jobidlist: jobId
				, filename: filename
				, receipientsemail: receipientsemail
				, filetypes: 'SRC|TX|TXT|HTM'
			}, function(data){
				data = trim(data);
			});
		}
	} else {
		//error
		statuscode = "-1";
		SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', data);
		EnableControls('translate');
	}
	
	iTotalTime += iSleep;
	if ((statuscode == "0" || statuscode == "1")) {
		setTimeout(function(){
			getJobStatusAndDownload(jobId);
		}, iSleep)
	} else {
		//timeout
		SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', "Error: Timeout to get output.");
		EnableControls('translate');
	}
}

function ClearText() {
	SetTextboxValue('txtText', '');
	SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', '');

	ShowControls('all');
}

function CopyText() {
	/* Get the text field */
	var oText = document.getElementById('txtTranslation');
	
	/* Select the text field */
	oText.select();
	
	/* Copy the text inside the text field */
	document.execCommand("copy");
}

function getLang(){
	var LangSelect = document.getElementById('PageLangSelect');
	var Lang = LangSelect.options[LangSelect.selectedIndex].value;    
	return Lang.toLowerCase();
}

function TextChanged() {
	var sText = GetTextboxValue('txtText');
	if (trim(sText).length > 0) {			
		if (trim(sText).length > 5000) {
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = GetDisplay("errormaxchar")+" "+trim(sText).length+"/5000";			
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = 'red';
		}
		else{
			$('#divTranslateButton').removeClass('disabled');
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = trim(sText).length+"/5000";
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = '#999999';
		}

		if (document.getElementById('txtText').clientHeight < document.getElementById('txtText').scrollHeight){
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.paddingRight = "10px";
			document.getElementById('imgClear').style.paddingRight = "10px";
		}
		else{
			document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.paddingRight = "0px";
			document.getElementById('imgClear').style.paddingRight = "0px";
		}
		
		document.getElementById('txtText').placeholder = "";
		document.getElementById('txtText').style.height = (document.documentElement.clientHeight-230)+"px";
		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').style.height = (document.documentElement.clientHeight-230)+"px";
		
		if (trim(sText).length > 50) {
			document.getElementById("txtText").style.fontSize = "18px"; 
			document.getElementById("txtTranslation").style.fontSize = "18px";
		}
		else{
			document.getElementById("txtText").style.fontSize = "24px";
			document.getElementById("txtTranslation").style.fontSize = "24px"; 	
		}
		
		ShowControls('text');
	}
	else{
		ShowControls('all');
	}
}

function ResetPage() {
	SetTextboxValue('txtText', '');
	SetTextboxValue('txtTranslation', '');
	document.getElementById('txtText').style.height = "200px";
	document.getElementById('txtTranslation').style.height = "200px";

	$('#divTranslateButton').removeClass('disabled');
	ShowControls('all');

	resetErrorText();
	setTableFileBlank();
	hSelectedFileMain = new Array();
	mainFiles = [];
	document.getElementById('fBrowseFile').value = "";
}

function doTextAlign(){

	if(GetComboboxValue('selEngine').trim().length==0)
		return;
	
	var LP = GetComboboxValue('selEngine').split(':')[1];
	var aLP = LP.split("-");
	var source = new String(aLP[0]).toLowerCase();
	var target = new String(aLP[1]).toLowerCase();
	
	if(hTextAlign.indexOf(source) > -1 )
		$('#txtText').attr("dir", "rtl");
	else
		$('#txtText').attr("dir", "");

	if(hTextAlign.indexOf(target) > -1 )
		$('#txtTranslation').attr("dir", "rtl");
	else
		$('#txtTranslation').attr("dir", "");
	
	/*
	if(hTextAlign[source] == "R")
		$('#txtText').attr("dir", "rtl");
	else
		$('#txtText').attr("dir", "");

	if(hTextAlign[target] == "R")
		$('#txtTranslation').attr("dir", "rtl");
	else
		$('#txtTranslation').attr("dir", "");
	*/
}

function getDomainDesc(domaincode, lang){
	var text = "";
	var hDomain = {};
	hDomain = hEngineLang[lang];	
	text = hDomain[domaincode];
	return text;
}

function LoadLangSelect(){
	
	var lang = xmlDoc.getElementsByTagName("lang");
	var key = "", value = "";
	
	if(lang.length>0){
	    for (var i = 0; i < lang.length; i++) {	    	
	    	key = lang[i].getAttribute('id');
	    	value = new String(lang[i].getAttribute('name')).trim();	
	    	if(value.length>0 && value!="null"){  
		    	$('#PageLangSelect').append($('<option>', { value : key }).text(value));	
	    	}	
	    }		
	}
	else{
    	$('#PageLangSelect').append($('<option>', { "English" : "en" }).text("English"));
    	$('#PageLangSelect').append($('<option>', { "中文" : "zh" }).text("中文"));
    	$('#PageLangSelect').append($('<option>', { "ภาษาไทย" : "th" }).text("ภาษาไทย"));	
	}
}

function changelang(selectObject){
	LoadDisplay(selectObject.value);
}

function GetDisplay(attname){
	var value = "";
	var language = getLang();
	value = GetDisplayLang(attname,language);
	return value;
}

function GetDisplayLang(attname, language){
	var value = "";
	var lang = xmlDoc.getElementsByTagName("lang");
    for (var i = 0; i < lang.length; i++) {
    	if(lang[i].getAttribute('id')==language){
	    	value = lang[i].getElementsByTagName(attname)[0].childNodes[0].nodeValue;
    		break;
    	}
    }    
	return value;
}

function str(obj){
	var result = "";
	try{
		if(obj!=null && obj!=undefine){
			result = new String(obj);	
		}
	}
	catch(ex){
		result = "";
	}
	return result;
}

var hLang = {};  			
var hStatusDefault = {};
var hTextAlign = new Array();
function LoadDisplay(language){
		
	var ddlEngine = document.getElementById('selEngine');
	var selIndex = ddlEngine.selectedIndex;
	ddlEngine.innerHTML = hEngine[language];
	ddlEngine.selectedIndex = selIndex;
	
	var lang = xmlDoc.getElementsByTagName("lang");
    for (var i = 0; i < lang.length; i++) {
    	if(lang[i].getAttribute('id')==language){

    		if(hLang[language]==null){
    			var hLangProp = {};    			
    			var hStatus = {};
    			hStatus[0] = GetDisplayLang("statusqueue",language);
    			hStatus[1] = GetDisplayLang("statusprocessing",language);
    			hStatus[2] = GetDisplayLang("statuscomplete",language);
    			hStatus[9] = GetDisplayLang("statuserror",language);
    			hStatus[18] = GetDisplayLang("statuscancel",language);
    			hLangProp["status"] = hStatus;
    			
    			hLang[language] = hLangProp;
    		}
    		
    		
//     		//Set logo
    		var logourl = getXMLValue(lang[i], "logourl");
    		if(logourl.trim().length>0){logourl = ".."+logourl;}
    		else{logourl = "../resources/images/Logo.png";}
     		$("#imgLogo").attr("src", logourl);
     		    		
    		setText(lang[i], "pageheading");
    		setText(lang[i], "buttontranslate");
    		setText(lang[i], "buttonreset");
    		setText(lang[i], "buttoncopy");
    		setText(lang[i], "textheaderlabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "headinglable");    		
    		setText(lang[i], "draglabel1");
    		setText(lang[i], "draglabel2");
    		setText(lang[i], "draglabel3");
    		setText(lang[i], "buttonbrowse");
    		
    		setText(lang[i], "documentoutputformatlabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "sameasdocumentlabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "htmllabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "textlabel");

    		setText(lang[i], "documentaftertranslationlabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "downloadlabel");
    		setText(lang[i], "emaildocumentlabel");
    		
    		$("#tblFile th:first").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tblfilename"));
    		$("#tblFile th:eq(1)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tblsize"));
    		
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:first").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tblfilename"));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(1)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tblsize"));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(2)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tbllanguagepair"));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(3)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "documentoutputformatlabel"));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(4)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "documentaftertranslationlabel"));
    		$("#tblFileProcess th:eq(5)").html(getXMLValue(lang[i], "tblstatus"));
    		
    		document.getElementById('txtText').placeholder = GetDisplayLang("textplaceholder",language);
    		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').placeholder = GetDisplayLang("translationplaceholder",language);
    		
    		if(document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color == 'red'){
        		var errorText = document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML;    
    			errorText = errorText.replace(GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar","en"), GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar",language));
    			errorText = errorText.replace(GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar","th"), GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar",language));
    			errorText = errorText.replace(GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar","zh"), GetDisplayLang("errormaxchar",language));
        		document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = errorText;
    		}
    		document.getElementById('selectfile').innerHTML = GetDisplayLang("selectfile",language);
    	}
    }    

	replaceLang();

}

function getTR(rowID){
	var trProp = {};
	for (var i in hTable){		
		trProp = hTable[i];	
		if(rowID==trProp["RowID"]){
			break;
		}
	}
	return trProp;
}

function replaceLang(){

	var Lang = getLang();
	if(hTable.length>0){
		var Output = "", OutputText = "", AfterTran="", AfterTranText="", Email = "";
		for (var i in hTable){			
			var trProp = hTable[i];			
			var rowID = trProp["RowID"];
			
			var tr = document.getElementById("tr"+rowID);			
			if(tr!=null){
				
				Output = trProp["Output"];
				OutputText = "";
				if(Output.indexOf('chkoutsamedoc')!=-1){
					OutputText = GetDisplayLang("sameasdocumentlabel",Lang);
				}
				if(Output.indexOf('chkouthtml')!=-1){
					if(OutputText.length>0) OutputText += ",";	
					OutputText += GetDisplayLang("htmllabel",Lang);
				}
				if(Output.indexOf('chkouttext')!=-1){
					if(OutputText.length>0) OutputText += ",";	
					OutputText += GetDisplayLang("textlabel",Lang);
				}
				
				AfterTran = trProp["AfterTran"];
				AfterTranText="";
				if(AfterTran.indexOf('downloaddoc')!=-1){
					AfterTranText = GetDisplayLang("downloadlabel",Lang);
				}
				if(AfterTran.indexOf('email')!=-1){
					if(AfterTranText.length>0) AfterTranText += ",";	
					AfterTranText += GetDisplayLang("emaildocumentlabel",Lang);
				}

				Email = trProp["Email"];
				if(Email.trim().length>0){
					AfterTranText += ": <span class=\"linkText\">"+Email+"</span>";
				}
				
				var Status = trProp["Status"];
				var jobID = trProp["JobID"];
				if(Status==2){
					Status = getstatus(Status, Lang);
					Status = "<a href=\"/resources/download-file/"+jobID+".zip\" title=\"JobID: "+jobID+"\">"+Status+"</a>";
				}
				else{
					Status = getstatus(Status);
					Status = "<span title=\"JobID: "+jobID+"\">"+Status+"</span>";
				}

				var domaincode = trProp["Domain"];
				var domaindesc = getDomainDesc(domaincode, Lang);
				

				$("#tr"+rowID+" td:eq(2)").html(domaindesc);
				$("#tr"+rowID+" td:eq(3)").html(OutputText);
				$("#tr"+rowID+" td:eq(4)").html(AfterTranText);
 				$("#tr"+rowID+" td:eq(5)").html(Status);
			}
		}
	}
}

function getXMLValue(xmlNode, attname){
	return xmlNode.getElementsByTagName(attname)[0].childNodes[0].nodeValue;
}

function setText(xmlNode, attname){
	document.getElementById(attname).innerHTML = xmlNode.getElementsByTagName(attname)[0].childNodes[0].nodeValue; 
}

function ShowControls(type) {
	if (type == 'text') {
		SetVisible('trTranslateText', true);
		SetVisible('lbText', true);
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocument', false);
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocumentHeader', false);		
		SetVisible('tblFile', false);
		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
		SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);	
		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);	
	} else if (type == 'doc') {
		SetVisible('trTranslateText', false);
		SetVisible('lbText', false);
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocument', true);		
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocumentHeader', false);
		SetVisible('tblFile', false);
		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
		SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);
		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);
		$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
	} else {

		if(GetTextboxValue('txtText').length>0){
			$('#divTranslateButton').removeClass('disabled');			
		}
		else{
			$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
		}
		
		SetVisible('trTranslateText', true);
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocument', true);
		SetVisible('trTranslateDocumentHeader', true);	
		SetVisible('tblFile', false);
		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
		SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);
		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);
		
		document.getElementById("txtText").style.fontSize = "24px";
		document.getElementById("txtTranslation").style.fontSize = "24px"; 	
		document.getElementById('txtText').style.height = "200px";
		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').style.height = "200px";
		
    	var Lang = getLang();    
		document.getElementById('txtText').placeholder = GetDisplayLang("textplaceholder",Lang);
		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').placeholder = GetDisplayLang("translationplaceholder",Lang);
		
		document.getElementById('txtTranslation').value = "";		
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').innerHTML = "0/5000";
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.color = '#999999';
		document.getElementById('lblLimit').style.paddingRight = "0px";
		document.getElementById('imgClear').style.paddingRight = "0px";

		EnableControls('translate');
	}
}

}

function DiableControls(type) {
	if (type == 'translate') {
		SetDisabled('txtText', 'disabled');
		SetDisabled('btnTranslate', 'disabled');
		SetDisabled('btnReset', 'disabled');
		
		SetVisible('divLoading', true);
	}
}

function EnableControls(type) {
	if (type == 'translate') {
		SetDisabled('txtText', '');
		SetDisabled('btnTranslate', '');
		SetDisabled('btnReset', '');
		
		SetVisible('divLoading', false);
	}
}

function CheckChanged(oCheck) {
	var srcChecked = 'images/checked.png';
	var srcUncheck = 'images/uncheck.png';
	var src = oCheck.src;
	//set image
	var srcCurrent = "";
	if (src.indexOf('uncheck.png') == src.length - 11) {
		srcCurrent = srcChecked;
	} else {
		srcCurrent = srcChecked;
	}

	oCheck.src = srcCurrent;
	if (oCheck.id == "imgSameDoc") {
		$("#imgHtml").attr("src", srcUncheck);
		$("#imgText").attr("src", srcUncheck);
	} else if (oCheck.id == "imgHtml") {
		$("#imgSameDoc").attr("src", srcUncheck);
		$("#imgText").attr("src", srcUncheck);
	} else if (oCheck.id == "imgText") {
		$("#imgSameDoc").attr("src", srcUncheck);
		$("#imgHtml").attr("src", srcUncheck);
	} else if (oCheck.id == "imgDownloadDoc") {
		$("#imgMail").attr("src", srcUncheck);
	} else if (oCheck.id == "imgMail") {
		$("#imgDownloadDoc").attr("src", srcUncheck);
	}
}

						<script type="text/javascript">
function performClick(elemId) {
   var elem = document.getElementById(elemId);
   elem.click();
}
function mailOn(){
	if($("#txtEmail").val().length>0){
		$('input[name=rAfterTran][value=email]').attr('checked', true);
		$('input[name=rAfterTran][value=downloaddoc]').attr('checked', false);	
	}
	else{
		$('input[name=rAfterTran][value=email]').attr('checked', false);
		$('input[name=rAfterTran][value=downloaddoc]').attr('checked', true);		
	}
}
function DiableRow(rowid) {
	
	var trProp = getTR(rowid);
	status = trProp["Status"];
	if(status!=0 && status!=1){
		var row = document.getElementById("tr"+rowid);
		row.outerHTML = "";
	}
	
	var tblFileProcess = document.getElementById('tblFileProcess');
	if (tblFileProcess.innerHTML.indexOf('<tr id=')==-1) {
		$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
		SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);
	}	
}

function DiableAllRow() {
	//clear all completed job.
	for (var jobid in parent.mapJob)
	{			
		var info = mapJob[jobid];
		var rowid = info.split("|")[0];
		var trProp = getTR(rowid);
		status = trProp["Status"];		
		if(status!=0 && status!=1){
			var row = document.getElementById("tr"+rowid);
			if(row!==null){
				row.outerHTML = "";	
			}
		}
	}

	var tblFileProcess = document.getElementById('tblFileProcess');
	if (tblFileProcess.innerHTML.indexOf('<tr id=')==-1) {
		$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
		SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);	
	}
}

function handleFileUpload(files,obj)
{	
	SetVisible('tblFileProcess', false);
	SetVisible('trTranslateText', false);
	
	//fBrowseFile.files = files;	
	selectFile(files);
}

function SelectDocument() {	
	$('#fBrowseFile').change( function(event) {
		//alert("fBrowseFile onchange");
    	var files = event.target.files;
    	selectFile(files);
    });
}

function selectFile(files){
	
	//Allowed exension: 
	var extension = ".doc,.docx,.xls,.xlsx,.ppt,.pptx,.htm,.html,.txt,.msg";	
	for(var i=0; i<files.length; i++) {
		var f = files[i];
		var ext = f.name.split('.').pop();
		if(extension.indexOf(ext)!=-1){
			parent.mainFiles.push(f);
		}
		else{
			//setErrorText("Input file does not match job type.");
			//return;
		}
	}

	var tblFile = document.getElementById('tblFile');    	
	var rowID = parseInt(document.getElementById('rowCount').value);	
	
	if(parent.hSelectedFileMain==null)
		parent.hSelectedFileMain = new Array();
	
    var rep = "";
	if(parent.mainFiles.length>0){

		SetVisible('lblErrorBatch', false);
		
		$('#divTranslateButton').removeClass('disabled');
    	for(var i=0; i<files.length; i++) {
    		var f = files[i];

    		var f = files[i];
    		var ext = f.name.split('.').pop();
    		if(extension.indexOf(ext)!=-1){
        		var size = f.size;
        		rowID = (rowID+1);
        		
        		parent.hSelectedFileMain.push(rowID, f.name+"_aosizeao_"+FormatNum(Math.round(size/1024))+"KB");
        		
        		rep += "<tr id=\"tr"+(rowID)+"\"><td>" + f.name+ "</td>";//File Name
        		rep += "<td align=\"center\">" + FormatNum(Math.round(size/1024)) + "KB</td></tr>";//Size    			
    		}
    		
    	}
    	document.getElementById('rowCount').value = rowID + 1;

    	tblFile.outerHTML = tblFile.outerHTML.replace("</tbody></table>", rep+"</tbody></table>");

		SetVisible('tblFile', true);
		SetVisible('selectfile', true);
	}
	else{
		$('#divTranslateButton').addClass('disabled');
		setTableFileBlank();
		//tblFile.outerHTML = "<table id=\"tblFile\" width=\"400px\"><tbody><tr><th width=\"75%\">Document(s) to translate</th><th width=\"25%\">Size</th></tr></tbody></table>";
 		SetVisible('tblFile', false);
 		SetVisible('selectfile', false);
	}

	var Lang = getLang();
	$("#tblFile th:first").html(GetDisplayLang("tblfilename",Lang));
	$("#tblFile th:eq(1)").html(GetDisplayLang("tblsize",Lang));
	
}

function FormatNum(x){
  var parts = x.toString().split(".");
  parts[0] = parts[0].replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",");
  return parts.join(".");
}

$(document).ready(function(){
	SelectDocument();
	var obj = $("#divDragAndDrop");
	obj.on('dragenter', function (e){
		e.stopPropagation();
		e.preventDefault();
	});
	obj.on('dragleave', function (e){
		e.stopPropagation();
		e.preventDefault();
	});
	obj.on('dragover', function (e){
		 e.stopPropagation();
		 e.preventDefault();
	});
	obj.on('drop', function (e){		
		 e.stopPropagation();
		 e.preventDefault();		 
		 var files = e.originalEvent.dataTransfer.files;		 
		 handleFileUpload(files,obj);
	});

	$(document).on('dragenter', function (e){
		e.stopPropagation();
		e.preventDefault();
	});
	$(document).on('dragover', function (e){
		e.stopPropagation();
		e.preventDefault();
	});
	$(document).on('drop', function (e){
		e.stopPropagation();
		e.preventDefault();
	});
});

           				<span id="draglabel2" class="dragDrop">into this Box</span><br />

           				<span id="draglabel3" class="dragDrop">or</span>
			        </td>
                    <td rowspan="2" width="20%" style="vertical-align:top;">
			           <table id="tblDocOption">
			               <tbody><tr>
			                   <td id="documentoutputformatlabel" class="textLableBold">Output Format</td>
			               </tr>
			               <tr>
								<td class="textLable">											
								<label class="container"><span id="sameasdocumentlabel">Same as Document</span>
								  <input type="checkbox" id="chkoutsamedoc" checked="checked" />
								  <span class="checkmark"></span>
								</label>
								<label class="container"><span id="htmllabel">HTML</span>
								  <input type="checkbox" id="chkouthtml" />
								  <span class="checkmark"></span>
								</label>
								<label class="container"><span id="textlabel">Text file</span>
								  <input type="checkbox" id="chkouttext" />
								  <span class="checkmark"></span>
								</label>
								</td>
			               </tr>
			           </tbody></table>
					</td>
                    <td rowspan="2" width="30%" style="vertical-align:top;">
			           <table id="tblAfterTranslate" style="width: 250px;">
			               <tbody><tr>
			                   <td id="documentaftertranslationlabel" class="textLableBold">After Translation</td>
			               </tr>
			               <tr>
								<td class="textLable">		
									<label class="rad">	
									<input type="radio" name="rAfterTran" value="downloaddoc" checked="checked" />
									<i></i> <span id="downloadlabel">Download Document</span>
									</label><br /><img id="imgSupport" src="images/spacer.png" style="height:5px;" /><br />
			                   		<label class="rad">
									<input type="radio" name="rAfterTran" value="email" />
									<i></i> <span id="emaildocumentlabel">Email Document as Attachment </span>
									</label><br />
									<img src="images/spacer.png" style="height:5px;width:22px;" /><input type="text" id="txtEmail" onkeypress="mailOn();" class="txt" style="width: 200px;" />
		                       </td>
			               </tr>
			           </tbody></table>
                    </td>
		        </tr>
	         	<tr>
	          		<td width="22%" align="center" valign="top">
	          		<form id="theform" method="post" action="translate.jsp" enctype="multipart/form-data" target="_blank">        		
						<div id="divBrowse" class="divBrowse" onclick="performClick('fBrowseFile');">
						<!--  onClick="ShowControls('doc');" -->
							<table align="center" width="90%" border="0">
		            			<tbody><tr>
		            				<td align="right"><img id="imgBrowseFile" src="images/folder-30.png" /></td>
		            				<td align="left"><span id="buttonbrowse">Browse for Files</span>
		            				<input type="file" id="fBrowseFile" multiple="" name="fBrowseFile" onclick="ShowControls('doc');" accept=".doc,.docx,.xls,.xlsx,.ppt,.pptx,.htm,.html,.txt,.msg" /></td>
		            			</tr>
		            		</tbody></table>
						</div>
					</form>
					</td>
				</tr>
		    </tbody></table></div>
		</td>
	</tr>
	<tr>
	    <td style="width: 30%; padding:10px 5px 0px 5px;" colspan="2">
		<input id="rowCount" type="hidden" value="1" /><table width="400px" id="tblFile" style="float: left; display: none;"><tbody><tr><th width="75%">Document(s) to translate</th><th width="25%">Size</th></tr></tbody></table>
		<span id="selectfile" class="dragDrop" style="position: relative; top: 8px; float: left; padding-left: 5px; display: none;">Select the engine and click translate button.</span>
	    <span id="lblErrorBatch" class="dragDrop" style="display: none;"></span>
	    </td>
	</tr>	
	<tr>
	    <td style="width: 100%; padding:0px 5px 0px 5px;" colspan="2"><table width="100%" id="tblFileProcess" style="display: none;">
		  <tbody><tr>
		    <th width="30%">Document(s) to translate</th>
		    <th width="8%">Size</th>
		    <th width="15%">Language Pair</th>
		    <th width="15%">Output Format</th>
		    <th width="20%">After Translation</th>
		    <th width="10%">Status</th>		    
		    <th width="3%"><img onclick="DiableAllRow();" alt="Clear all completed job." style="cursor: pointer;" src="images/clear.png" /></th></tr>
		</tbody></table>
	    </td>
	</tr>	    
</tbody></table>

					</td>
				</tr>
			</tbody></table>
